metas.name: Kaiju No. 8: Mission Recon
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Sci-Fi Tags:Shounen/Tokusatsu/Kaiju/Urban Fantasy Compilation movie of Kaijuu 8-gou.

In a Kaiju-filled Japan, Kafka Hibino works in monster disposal. After reuniting with his childhood friend Mina Ashiro, a rising star in the anti-Kaiju Defense Force, he decides to pursue his abandoned dream of joining the Force... when he suddenly transforms into the powerful "Kaiju No. 8." With help from his junior colleague Reno Ichikawa, Kafka hides his identity while striving towards his life-long dream of passing the Defense Force exam and standing at Mina's side. But when a mysterious intelligent Kaiju attacks a Defense Force base, Kafka faces a crucial decision in a desperate situation...

(Source: Crunchyroll)

metas.name: COLORFUL STAGE! The Movie: A Miku Who Can't Sing
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Music Tags:Primarily Teen Cast/Ensemble Cast/Urban Fantasy/Band/Vocal Synth/Urban/Idol/Isekai/Female Protagonist/Primarily Female Cast/Rehabilitation/Virtual World/Rock Music/Hip-hop Music/Kemonomimi/Nekomimi/Bar/Dancing/Restaurant/Artificial Intelligence Set in modern day Shibuya, Ichika Hoshino, a high school girl and street musician, encounters an unknown version of Hatsune Miku after hearing a Miku song that she'd never heard before in a CD store. Ichika learns that this version of Miku is having trouble reaching people with her songs, so together they team up to try to touch the hearts of their audience through music.

(Source: Crunchyroll News, edited)

metas.name: MAKE A GIRL
metas.description:
Genres: Romance, Sci-Fi Tags:Full CGI/Artificial Intelligence/Robots/Software Development/Fake Relationship/Heterosexual/Real Robot The story is centered around the main character, Akira, and his scientifically created girlfriend, No. 0.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

metas.name: The Rose of Versailles
metas.description:
Genres: Adventure, Drama, Romance Tags:Shoujo/Historical/Foreign/Musical Theater/Ojou-sama/Military/Royal Affairs/Female Protagonist/Primarily Adult Cast/Crossdressing/Heterosexual/Gender Bending/Class Struggle/Swordplay/Guns/Medieval Movie project commemorating the 50th anniversary of the Versailles no Bara manga's publication.

Hoping to unite their countries with an alliance, The Empress of Austria arranges her daughter, the delightful yet spoiled Marie Antoinette, to marry the crown prince of France, Louis XVI. Upon arriving in Versailles, the Austrian princess meets Oscar Francois de Jarjayes, Captain of the Royal Guards—a seemingly dashing young man—but to Antoinette's astonishment, he is in fact a woman!

The youngest daughter of a noble family with a prominent lack of a male heir, Oscar was raised as a boy to continue the family's military legacy. Suffocated by the rigid rules associated with her new position and longing for companionship, Antoinette immediately takes a liking to this intriguing young woman, and wastes no time befriending her. However, as the childish new queen foolishly abuses her power, Oscar is conflicted between maintaining her loyalty to the royal family and addressing the growing concern of poverty among the common people.

Recalling the events of the French Revolution, Versailles no Bara depicts the struggles of two women unjustly burdened by family expectations. Yet, despite being forced to deny their identities at the expense of personal happiness, they march on to become key players in the annals of history.

(Source: MAL Rewrite)

metas.name: Senpai is an Otokonoko Movie: Sunshine After the Rain
metas.description: Genres: Comedy, Drama, Romance Tags:Crossdressing/LGBTQ+ Themes/Agender/Love Triangle/Coming of Age/Femboy/Primarily Teen Cast/Found Family/School/Family Life/Bullying/Josei/Basketball Theatrical follow-up to the TV anime Senpai wa Otokonoko.

metas.name: Mononoke The Movie: Chapter II - The Ashes of Rage
metas.description:
Genres: Fantasy, Horror, Mystery, Psychological, Supernatural Tags:Politics/Pregnancy/Royal Affairs/Class Struggle/Youkai/Male Protagonist/Tanned Skin Sequel to Mononoke: Karakasa and second movie in the Mononoke movie trilogy.

The Medicine Seller returns as the Edo harem faces a new crisis, with family feuds, inner turmoil and fiery envy igniting the birth of a raging spirit.

(Source: Netflix)

metas.name: Batman Ninja vs. Yakuza League
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Sci-Fi Tags:Superhero/Yakuza/Male Protagonist/Anachronism/Samurai/Real Robot/Super Robot/Aliens/CGI/Primarily Adult Cast/Super Power/Ninja/Foreign/Full CGI/Ensemble Cast/Primarily Male Cast In this sequel to Batman Ninja, the Batman family has returned to the present to discover that Japan has disappeared, and a giant island - Hinomoto - is now in the sky over Gotham City. At the top sit the Yakuza, a group of superpowered individuals who reign without honor or humanity and look suspiciously like the Justice League. Now, it’s up to Batman and his allies to save Gotham!

(Source: Amazon Prime Video)

Note: Release date reflects the release in Japan. The film was released in the US on March 18, 2025.

metas.name: Aldnoah.Zero (Re+)
metas.description: Genres: Action, Drama, Mecha, Sci-Fi Tags:Super Robot A movie compilation of the first and second cours of Aldnoah.Zero and also includes the new animation to conclude the series, Aldnoah.Zero: Ame no Danshou.

metas.name: Binan Koukou Chikyuu Bouei-bu ETERNAL LOVE!
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Mahou Shoujo, Sci-Fi, Slice of Life Tags:Magic/Parody/Super Power/Henshin/Urban Fantasy/Meta/Primarily Adult Cast/Urban/Animals/Aliens/Idol/Primarily Male Cast A new film announced for the 10th anniversary of Binan Koukou Chikyuu Bouei-bu.

Note: Relations are provisional and will be updated when more info is announced.

metas.name: Hypnosis Mic -Division Rap Battle- Movie
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Music, Sci-Fi Tags:Hip-hop Music/Full CGI/Primarily Male Cast/Ensemble Cast/Super Power/Matriarchy/Band "In a world where words mean power, they risk all that they stand for".

The final Division Rap Battle begins. 48 different patterns, 16 new songs and 7 possible endings.

This film will be Japan's first-ever interactive movie, where the audience's choices will change the development and outcome of each screening. The story unfolds differently based on the audience’s decisions, offering an entirely new participatory cinematic experience.

(Source: Hypnosis Mic Youtube Channel, edited)

metas.name: Doraemon: Nobita no E Sekai Monogatari
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy Tags:Kids Doraemon, Nobita, and friends enter a painting into a medieval European world. In the painting, they meet Claire and Milo, children from the country of Artoria. They also encounter a small demon with wings named Chai. Together, they face a powerful enemy for a legendary jewel.

(Source: Anime News Network)

metas.name: Thunderbolt Fantasy Sword Seekers -The Finale-
metas.description: Genres: Action, Drama, Fantasy Tags:Puppetry/Primarily Adult Cast/Swordplay/Demons/Martial Arts/Wuxia/Gore Theatrical follow-up to Thunderbolt Fantasy: Touriken Yuuki 4.

metas.name: Oshiri Tantei: STAR AND MOON
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Mystery Tags:Detective/Kids Story begins when Koala asks Butt Detective to find a missing relative who disappeared from an idol contest. The case takes Butt Detective to Stardust Island, the site of the contest, and also the home of the international criminal organization Phantom Thief Academy, headed by Phantom Thief G. Here, the organization advances its secret conspiracy, codenamed the Dark Age Plan. Butt Detective enters Stardust Island under the guise of an idol. At the same time, he joins forces with Phantom Thief U, who is out to steal back the valuable Moonlight Stone from Phantom Thief G. The story will also reveal more about Brown's past.

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)

metas.name: Shimajirou: Shimajirou to Yuuki no Uta
metas.description:
Genres: Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy Tags: The story centers on Miley, a young white tiger who is offered the lead role of Captain Hat by an acting troupe. Miley has no confidence in herself, so Shimajirou comes up with a plan to encourage her. Suddenly, they are sucked into a magical bag, and must embark on an adventure in the world within the bag.

(Source: Anime News Network)

metas.name: VIRGIN PUNK Clockwork Girl
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi Tags:Cyberpunk/Female Protagonist/Guns/Rotoscoping/Assassins/CGI/Nudity/Cyborg The year is 2099.
Humanity has advanced, overcoming all injuries and illnesses with the development of the Medical Android Technology “Somadea.” However, along with the development of Somadea, crimes misusing said technology have rapidly increased.

Somadea grants physical abilities far superior to those of normal flesh and blood, and by illegally modifying it, Somadea can be misused for criminal purposes.

To deal with these Somadea crimes, the government established the Bounty Hunter System. Civilians registered as bounty hunters are permitted to kill illegal Somadea users designated as wanted criminals by the police. In return, they are rewarded with large amounts of bounty money.

Conditions for Receiving Bounty:
Bring the brain of a wanted criminal possessing illegal Somadea to authorities.
Whether the target is alive or dead…is irrelevant.

In this unforgiving world, Ubu Kamigori makes a living hunting down criminals as a bounty hunter. But one day, when she returns home from a job, she finds the man with whom she has a sordid history waiting there – Mr. Elegance. And so, her destiny begins to unravel.

A tale woven by mechanical girls and the smell of gunpowder smoke, this suspenseful action begins!

(Source: Aniplex USA, edited)

metas.name: Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid: A lonely dragon wants to be loved
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life Tags:Dragons/Magic/Found Family/Seinen/Female Protagonist/War/Maids/Yuri/LGBTQ+ Themes Theatrical follow-up to the second season Kobayashi-san Chi no Maidragon S and Kobayashi-san Chi no Maidragon S: Nippon no Omotenashi (Attend wa Dragon desu) OVA.

"I don’t want to let go of her hand. Because, we are a family."

Miss Kobayashi, Tohru, Kanna, and Iruru's peaceful lives are shattered when Kanna’s father, Kamun Kamui, leader of the Chaos Forces, arrives and forces her to return to the Dragon World to fix a past mistake. With a war brewing between Chaos and Harmony, Kanna must find a way to unite the two worlds but is torn between her loyalty to her friends and her father's demands. Miss Kobayashi, however, refuses to let her go and tries to mend Kanna and Kamui’s broken bond. As dragons clash, Iruru uncovers a hidden force manipulating the war. Can they stop the war before it consumes both worlds?

(Source: Kyoto Animation YouTube Channel, Crunchyroll)

metas.name: JUJUTSU KAISEN: Hidden Inventory / Premature Death – The Movie
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Drama, Supernatural Tags:Urban Fantasy/Curses/Shounen/Exorcism/Super Power/Demons/Found Family/Criminal Organization "The strongest duo—A youth they can never return to."

Recompilation film of Jujutsu Kaisen 2nd Season's "Kaigyoku・Gyokusetsu" (Hidden Inventory / Premature Death) arc (episodes 1-5 re-edited) with new footage showing glimpses of school memories accompanied by an acoustic version of "Ao no Sumika" (Where Our Blue Is) by Tatsuya Kitani.

Before they were enemies, Satoru Gojo and Suguru Geto were high school classmates and friends. The two most powerful sorcerers are tasked with protecting Riko Amanai, a student who has been designated to be sacrificed as the Star Plasma Vessel, until she can fulfill her duty. Pursued by a religious cult and other curse users, they are the only sorcerers capable of carrying out such a difficult task – but this mission will set their destinies, and challenge the two sorcerers in ways unimaginable.

(Source: GKIDS)

metas.name: Detective Conan: One-Eyed Flashback
metas.description:
Genres: Mystery Tags:Detective/Snowscape/Police/Male Protagonist/Crime/Disability/Amnesia The 28th Detective Conan movie.

When a researcher is attacked in the Yatsugatake Mountains, Nagano PD’s Kansuke Yamato and Yui Uehara investigate, but Kansuke’s old eye injury flares up — hinting at a dark connection. Meanwhile, Kogoro’s ex-colleague is murdered after looking into a past incident of Kansuke’s. Teaming up with Amuro and Kazami, Conan digs in to uncover the truth behind it all.

(Source: Sony Pictures Australia)

metas.name: Princess Principal: Crown Handler - Chapter 4
metas.description: Genres: Action, Adventure, Mystery, Sci-Fi Tags:Female Protagonist/Espionage/Foreign/Primarily Teen Cast/Primarily Female Cast/Politics/Royal Affairs/Conspiracy/Urban/Steampunk The fourth out of six movie sequels to the Princess Principal TV series.

metas.name: LUPIN THE IIIRD: The Movie - The Immortal Bloodline
metas.description:
Genres: Action Tags:Assassins/Guns/Male Protagonist/Crime/Conspiracy/Primarily Adult Cast/Cars/Samurai/Anti-Hero/Detective/Police The fourth movie under the LUPIN THE IIIRD series of films.

A special invitation has been sent to Lupin and his crew to an uncharted island. The invitee is believed to be the mastermind who controls the world's top mercenaries and is connected to crimes throughout the world! Who could this mysterious person be? The answer lies on the uncharted island hidden away from existence. To find out the identity of the mastermind and steal his vast wealth, Lupin and his crew as well as Inspector Zenigata, in his attempt to capture them, are led to this mysterious island. The island is shrouded full of mysteries including old discarded tanks and firearms along with strange and mysterious inhabitants. Supposedly the dead assassins from his past are there waiting for Lupin and his friends.

(Source: POM Anime)

metas.name: Boku to Roboco Movie
metas.description: Genres: Comedy, Slice of Life Tags:Shounen/Robots/Maids/Henshin/Parody/Super Power/Surreal Comedy Theatrical follow-up to Boku to Roboco.

metas.name: Kaitou Queen no Yuuga na Vacances
metas.description:
Genres: Mystery Tags:Crime/Detective Announced at the "Mirage QUEEN Prefers Parties" event, that a new Mirage QUEEN anime has been greenlit.

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)

metas.name: Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ TABOO NIGHT XXXX
metas.description:
Genres: Music
Tags:Idol/Primarily Adult Cast/CGI/Primarily Male Cast/Ensemble Cast
The third movie in the UtaPri franchise, spotlighting the idol group QUARTET NIGHT.

metas.name: Mumei no Jinsei
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Music, Psychological Tags: From birth to death, each person goes through life with a variety of nicknames, and sometimes derogatory. The story depicts the beautiful yet sorrowful life of the protagonist who, unintentionally, rises to the top, against a backdrop of problems we are facing today, such as elderly drivers, the dark side of the entertainment industry, the unknown deaths of young people, and war.

(Annecy Festival Website)

metas.name: Bousei no Volicia Dai Ni Shou: Gunjou
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Mecha, Romance, Sci-Fi Tags:Yuri/Aliens/Gods/LGBTQ+ Themes/School/Space/Primarily Female Cast/Urban Fantasy/Coastal/Swordplay/Female Protagonist/Urban Second film of Bousei no Volicia film trilogy.

At the last stronghold of humanity, the Heavenly Crest (Astronomy) Club, Akio learns the fate of the world. Two pilots are needed to battle the two remaining Usurpers which are targeting the faded Fire of Life. During the battle against the second enemy, during the curse of happy times, the choice between the happy present and the future Akio must dedicate her soul to approaches.

(Source: Official Site, translated)

metas.name: JUNK WORLD
metas.description: Genres: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi, Thriller Tags:Philosophy/Stop Motion A prequel film to Junk Head.

metas.name: Dragon Heart: Reikai Tanbouki
metas.description:
Genres: Fantasy, Supernatural
Tags:
null

metas.name: Aikatsu! Memorial Stage: Kagayaki no Unit Cup
metas.description:
Genres: Music Tags:Primarily Female Cast/Idol/Female Protagonist/Fashion/Acting/Kids/School/CGI Compilation film of Aikatsu!'s 3rd Season's "Aikatsu Restaurant" episode (ep. 140), followed by the "Unit Cup" arc (eps. 136-138), also featuring new segments with commentary from Akari, Madoka, Juri and Sumire. A part of the 10th anniversary celebrations of the Akari Generation.

After an announcement that a "Unit Cup" will be held at Starlight Academy's middle school, the eight performing two-member units are as motivated as they can be. This time, the event's broadcast will also feature a special corner where the idols report on each other's true faces behind the scenes. Is it time for the idols to clash with each other more passionately than ever?! The curtain rises on the Unit Cup right here and now!

(Source: Official Website, translated)

metas.name: Dream Animals THE MOVIE
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Fantasy Tags: Dream Animals biscuits, a long-selling snack beloved by Japanese since its launch in 1978 has been sold in more than 20 countries around the world and features the animal names written in English on the biscuits. The product has enjoyed an explosion in popularity in recent years as merchandise, especially among young people. Now for the first time, the product is given treatment as an animated movie called Dream Animals: The Movie. How will these animal biscuit characters behave and sound as they embark upon a thrilling adventure while tugging at your heartstrings with endearingly rich personalities.

(Source: TBS)

metas.name: Soreike! Anpanman: Chapon no Hero!
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Fantasy Tags: The film centers on Chapon, a mysterious boy who falls from the sky without any knowledge of where he came from. Staying with Anpanman, he one day helps someone out and gets to know the joy of making someone smile, and dreams of becoming a hero like Anpanman. But when Baikinman arrives, and reveals the secret of Chapon's origins, Chapon must figure out if his origins or his dreams define who he is.

(Source: Anime News Network)

metas.name: Q
metas.description:
Genres: 
Tags:
Graduation work of Masataka Kihara at Tama Art University.

metas.name: Chainsaw Man – The Movie: Reze Arc
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Drama, Horror, Romance, Supernatural Tags:Demons/Monster Boy/Male Protagonist/Urban Fantasy/Urban/Henshin/Gore/Heterosexual/Body Horror/Philosophy/Anti-Hero/Psychosexual/POV/Coming of Age/Shounen/Love Triangle/Nudity/Angels/School/Surreal Comedy/Swimming/Feet/CGI/Femboy Theatrical follow-up to Chainsaw Man.

Denji became “Chainsaw Man”, a boy with a devil’s heart, and is now part of Special Division 4’s devil hunters. After a date with Makima, the woman of his dreams, Denji takes shelter from the rain. There he meets Reze, a girl who works in a café.

(Source: MAPPA CHANNEL)

metas.name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba Infinity Castle
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural Tags:Demons/Male Protagonist/Swordplay/War/Revenge/Shounen/Super Power/Martial Arts/Dungeon/Gore/Curses/Body Horror/CGI/Ensemble Cast/Historical Part 1 of the theatrical trilogy adaptation of the Infinity Castle Arc.

Tanjiro Kamado – a boy who joined an organization dedicated to hunting down demons called the Demon Slayer Corps after his younger sister Nezuko was turned into a demon.

While growing stronger and deepening his friendships and bonds with fellow corps members, Tanjiro has battled many demons with his comrades – Zenitsu Agatsuma and Inosuke Hashibira. Along the way, his journey has led him to fight alongside the Demon Slayer Corps’ highest-ranking swordsmen, the Hashira, including Flame Hashira Kyojuro Rengoku aboard the Mugen Train, Sound Hashira Tengen Uzui within the Entertainment District, as well as Mist Hashira Muichiro Tokito and Love Hashira Mitsuri Kanroji at the Swordsmith Village.

As the Demon Slayer Corps members and Hashira engaged in a group strength training program, the Hashira Training, in preparation for the forthcoming battle against the demons, Muzan Kibutsuji appears at the Ubuyashiki Mansion. With the head of the Demon Corps in danger, Tanjiro and the Hashira rush to the headquarters but are plunged into a deep descent to a mysterious space by the hands of Muzan Kibutsuji.

The destination of where Tanjiro and Demon Slayer Corps have fallen is the demons’ stronghold – the Infinity Castle. And so, the battleground is set as the final battle between the Demon Slayer Corps and the demons ignites.

(Source: Crunchyroll)

metas.name: bâan: The Boundary of Adulthood
metas.description:
Genres: Fantasy Tags:Urban Fantasy/Coming of Age/Female Protagonist/Isekai/Found Family/Adoption/Mythology/Male Protagonist/Urban A story of two people in search of a new life, who leave their birthplaces - travelling to a whole different world trying to find a place where they truly belong. Set in the fictional world of Euthania, a land rich in nature with various magical races based on South East Asian Mythology, which is connected to Japan via a warp gate.

(Source: Official Trailer)

metas.name: 100 METERS
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Sports Tags:Athletics/Rotoscoping/Coming of Age/Philosophy/Male Protagonist/Outdoor Activities/Fitness/Shounen 100 METERS follows Togashi, a track star who is born to run. As a kid, he is naturally gifted and wins every 100-meter race without effort. But in sixth grade, he meets Komiya, a transfer student who is full of determination but lacks technique. In teaching him, Togashi gives Komiya a new purpose: to win no matter what. Years pass by, and Togashi and Komiya meet again as rivals on the track and reveal their true selves.

(Source: GKIDS)

metas.name: Fushigi ‌no ‌Kuni ‌de ‌Alice to: Dive ‌in ‌Wonderland
metas.description:
Genres: Fantasy Tags:Female Protagonist/Fairy Tale/Isekai I'm supposed to be reading the air so I don't screw up,
I'm doing what everyone else is doing,
Why can't I get things done?

Rise Azumino, a university student, was lost in her life,
One day, guided by an invitation letter left behind by her late grandmother, she enters “Wonderland".
There she meets a girl named Alice and they begin their journey together.

Rise meets the White Rabbit, the Caterpillar, the Queen of Hearts, the Trumpeter, the Mad Hatter and the March Hare, Humpty Dumpty, the twins Tweedle Dum and Tweedle Dee, the Cheshire Cat and ......
The residents of Wonderland appear one after another in front of Rise!
And the crazy commotion that ensues!
What kind of future will Rise choose in this crazy adventure with Alice?

This adventure will surely bring a smile to your face tomorrow!

(Source: Official Site, Translated)

metas.name: ChaO
metas.description:
Genres: Fantasy, Romance Tags:Mermaid In a futuristic world where humans and mermaids coexist, ChaO follows Stephan, a mild-mannered office worker at a shipbuilding company, whose life is upended when he is suddenly proposed to by Chao — a princess from the mermaid kingdom. With no time to make sense of what’s happening, Stephan soon finds himself living with the unpredictable, wholehearted Chao. As her sincere love begins to break down his emotional barriers, an unexpected and touching romance begins to unfold.

(Source: GKIDS)

metas.name: Tooi-san wa Seishun Shitai! "Baka to SmaPho to Romance to"
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy Tags:School Tooi, an ordinary high school girl, was expecting a normal school life—until everything changed on her very first day.

After catching the attention of the unpredictable and overly energetic classmate Jel, she's suddenly roped into the mysterious "Youth Romance Club," a bizarre school group dedicated to chasing down anything that feels "youthful" or "romantic."

What should've been a carefree club quickly spirals into chaotic antics, with Tooi constantly playing the straight man to everyone's nonsense. To make things even wilder, the club's antics start getting streamed online!

Between laughter, unexpected twists, and even a mysterious incident, this unpredictable school life is just getting started.

metas.name: AS ONE
metas.description:
Genres: Mecha, Sci-Fi Tags:Full CGI Square Enix’s sci-fi arcade game Starwing Paradox is making a comeback as a prequel anime movie. A new anime feature film titled AS ONE has been announced as a prequel story set 20 years before the events of the game, expanding the game’s universe with a new story. The movie is set to premiere in Summer 2025.

(Source: Anime Corner)

metas.name: Odekake Kozame: Tokai no Otomodachi
metas.description:
Genres: Slice of Life Tags:Anthropomorphism/Iyashikei/Animals/Urban Kozame-chan's everyday life is full of fun and excitement! This time, the next destination is the big city. What awaits Kozame-chan is an unfamiliar place, and new friends. A big adventure filed with tiny miracles is about to begin.

(Source: Youtube)

Note: The film received an early premiere at the Tokyo International Shark Film Festival on August 3, 2025.

metas.name: Crayon Shin-chan: Chou Karei! Shakunetsu no Kasukabe Dancers
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Ecchi, Slice of Life
Tags:Kids/Foreign
null

metas.name: KING OF PRISM -Your Endless Call- Minna Kirameke! Prism☆Tours
metas.description:
Genres: Music, Sports Tags:Idol/CGI/Primarily Male Cast/Ice Skating This time King of Prism is "Prism☆Tours"! Shin Ichijou and the other six members of SePTENTRION will travel across time and worlds in a time machine to the origins of Prism Shows.

It will cross the boundaries of the series and intertwine with the worlds of the "Pretty Rhythm" series, "PriPara" series , "Kiratto Pri☆Chan", and "Waccha PriMagi!" to deliver a sparkling Prism☆Tours.

Fated boy meets boy, our worlds are now connected by the prism's sparkle!

(Source: Official Website, translated)

metas.name: Tatsuki Fujimoto 17-26
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Comedy, Drama, Romance, Sci-Fi, Slice of Life, Supernatural Tags:Episodic/Anthology/Surreal Comedy/School/Family Life/Female Protagonist/Male Protagonist/Urban Fantasy/Magic/Found Family/Gender Bending/Aliens/Coastal/Assassins/Heterosexual/Nudity/Drawing/Disability/Urban/Mermaid/Vampire/Shapeshifting/Dystopian/Monster Girl/Language Barrier/LGBTQ+ Themes/Shounen/Henshin An anthology series adapting 8 short stories created by manga artist Tatsuki Fujimoto between ages 17 and 26.

1) A Couple Clucking Chickens Were Still Kickin' in the Schoolyard (Dir. Seishirou Nagaya, ZEXCS)
2) Sasaki Stopped a Bullet (Dir. Nobukage Kimura, Lapin Track)
3) Love is Blind (Dir. Nobuyuki Takeuchi, Lapin Track)
4) Shikaku (Dir. Naoya Ando, GRAPH77)
5) Mermaid Rhapsody (Dir. Tetsuaki Watanabe, 100Studio)
6) Woke-Up-as-a-Girl Syndrome (Dir. Kazuaki Terasawa, Studio Kafka)
7) Nayuta of the Prophecy (Dir. Tetsuaki Watanabe, 100Studio)
8) Sisters (Dir. Osamu Honma, P.A.WORKS)

Note: This anime had a pre-release world premiere at the "Global Stage Hollywood 2025" film festival on October 5, 2025. A general two-week theatrical run in Japan divided into two parts released on the same day October 17, 2025. The anime series later streamed worldwide in Amazon Prime Video on November 8, 2025.

metas.name: Zombie Land Saga: Yume Ginga Paradise
metas.description:
Genres: Comedy, Music, Supernatural
Tags:Idol/Zombie/Female Protagonist/Ensemble Cast/Primarily Female Cast/Transgender/Cute Girls Doing Cute Things/LGBTQ+ Themes
Anime movie announced during the live concert "Zombie Land Saga LIVE ～FranChouChou Saga yo tomoni waite kure～" held on Oct 17, 2021.

metas.name: Scarlet
metas.description:
Genres: Fantasy Tags:Revenge/Female Protagonist/Full CGI/Crossover Scarlet, the protagonist of this work, is a princess whose father, the king of a certain country, was murdered. However, after failing to exact revenge, Scarlet wakes up to find herself in the "Land of the Dead."

In this "Land of the Dead," filled with madness, it is said that if one does not exact revenge on their nemesis and reach the "Endless Place," they will become "nothingness" and disappear from existence.

Will Scarlet be able to exact revenge on her nemesis without becoming "nothingness"? The story unfolds as the endless journey for revenge begins.

(Source: Animate Times, Translated)

metas.name: JUJUTSU KAISEN: Execution -Shibuya Incident x The Culling Game Begins-
metas.description:
Genres: Action, Drama, Supernatural Tags:Urban/Urban Fantasy/Curses/Super Power/Exorcism/Shounen/Male Protagonist/Magic Movie compilation of the Shibuya Incident Arc from the second season of Jujutsu Kaisen and the first two episodes of the third season's Culling Game Arc.

A veil abruptly descends over the busy Shibuya area amid the bustling Halloween crowds, trapping countless civilians inside. Satoru Gojo, the strongest jujutsu sorcerer, steps into the chaos. But lying in wait are curse users and spirits scheming to seal him away.

Yuji Itadori, accompanied by his classmates and other top-tier jujutsu sorcerers, enters the fray in an unprecedented clash of curses — the Shibuya Incident.

In the aftermath, ten colonies across Japan are transformed into dens of curses in a plan orchestrated by Noritoshi Kamo, the most wicked sorcerer in history. As the deadly Culling Game starts, Special Grade sorcerer Yuta Okkotsu is assigned to carry out Yuji’s execution for his perceived crimes.

(Source: GKIDS)

metas.name: GIRLS BAND CRY: Seishun Kyousoukyoku
metas.description: Genres: Drama, Music, Slice of Life Tags:Rock Music/Female Protagonist/Band/Full CGI/Coming of Age Compilation film of GIRLS BAND CRY. The first of the GBC compilation movie duology.

metas.name: The Last Blossom
metas.description:
Genres: Drama Tags:Male Protagonist/Prison/Yakuza "What a pathetic life it’s been."

An elderly inmate serving a life sentence awaits a lonely death in his solitary cell—until a voice calls out to him. It belongs to a balsam flower, Housenka, that speaks like a human. Through their "conversation," the old man begins to reflect on the life he’s led.

(Source: Annecy Festival)

metas.name: GIRLS BAND CRY: Naa, Mirai.
metas.description: Genres: Drama, Music, Slice of Life Tags:Rock Music/Full CGI/Primarily Female Cast/Band/Female Protagonist Compilation film of GIRLS BAND CRY. The second of the GBC compilation movie duology.

metas.name: Peleliu: Rakuen no Guernica
metas.description:
Genres: Drama Tags:War/Historical/Military/Male Protagonist Anime adaptation of Kazuyoshi Takeda's Peleliu: Rakuen no Guernica manga.

The story follows the daily lives of Japanese soldiers taking part in the Battle of Peleliu during World War II: a high-casualty, months-long campaign. The main character, Tamaru, dreams of returning home to become a mangaka, and sees their island outpost as a wild paradise that can one day be used as a setting for one of his stories. Most of his comrades, however, are prepared for the more realistic scenario - that they will not be leaving Peleliu alive.

metas.name: Love Live! Nijigasaki Gakuen School Idol Doukoukai: Kanketsu-hen 2
metas.description: Genres: Music, Slice of Life Tags:Idol/Female Protagonist/Dancing/Primarily Female Cast/Primarily Teen Cast/Cute Girls Doing Cute Things The second in the trilogy of Love Live! Nijigasaki Gakuen School Idol Doukoukai films that continues the story beyond season two and the OVA.

metas.name: Kono Hon wo Nusumu Mono wa
metas.description:
Genres: Adventure, Fantasy, Mystery Tags:Primarily Female Cast/Female Protagonist Descended from a long line of book collectors, high school student Mifuyu is surrounded by books in every aspect of her life. Her great-grandfather established the famous Mikura Hall, a library in the heart of town, and even the townspeople are all avid readers. There’s just one problem—Mifuyu hates books! But when a thief in Mikura Hall triggers an ancient curse, she’s left with no choice but to reclaim the stolen books herself…by entering the very stories she despises! With the help of the mysterious Mashiro, will she be able to restore her great-grandfather’s collection and save her town from a magical doom?

(Source: Yen Press)

metas.name: Kimi to Idol Precure♪ Omatase! Kimi ni Todokeru KirakkiLive!
metas.description: Genres: Mahou Shoujo, Music Tags:Fairy/Female Protagonist/Henshin/Kids/Idol/Primarily Female Cast/Magic/Crossover Movie of Kimi to Idol Precure♪, initially revealed at theatrical screenings of Wonderful Precure! The Movie! Dokidoki♡Game no Sekai de Daibouken!.

metas.name: Toritsukare Otoko
metas.description:
Genres: Music Tags: The story centers on a young man named Giuseppe, who is called "Toristukare Otoko" by the townspeople because once he gets absorbed in something, he cannot look at anything else. One day, he falls in love at first sight with a girl selling balloons named Pechka. He goes crazy and tries to get closer to Pechka, but she has a sadness in her heart and... For the sake of his beloved Pechka, Giuseppe and his partner, the mouse Cielo, secretly solve her worries by using the many tricks he has been obsessed with.

(Source: Crunchyroll News, edited)

metas.name: Aikatsu! x PriPara THE MOVIE -Deai no Kiseki-
metas.description:
Genres: Music Tags:Idol/Crossover/Female Protagonist/Primarily Female Cast Akari Oozora and Laala Manaka. Two idols shining in their own worlds suddenly find themselves on the same stage!
A magical encounter between two worlds that was never supposed to intersect: Aikatsu and PriPara!
The idols of Starlight Academy and Parajuku were enjoying a dream collaboration at the joint live festival, but before they knew it the outside world was in big trouble..!?
The perfect stage packed with excitement and glitter! Everyone's friends, everyone's idols — their idol activities begin right here!

(Source: Official Website, translated)

metas.name: Wadachi wo Koete Yuke
metas.description:
Genres: Drama, Sci-Fi Tags:Primarily Female Cast/Female Protagonist/Snowscape/Military In the shadow of a ruinous war, three young women are serving as soldiers in a barren, snow-swept landscape. Their task is to scour the frozen wastes for stragglers of the Iron Army, eerie, formerly human flesh-weapons. Gros and especially the inexperienced Leichte admire Esus, stronger and wiser than they. Esus has her weaknesses, though, and unhealed wounds in her heart. Somewhere out there in the vast, deadly sea of snow lie answers—to Esus' pain, and to the awful secret of this war.

(Source: fantasiafestival.com)

metas.name: Sumikko Gurashi: Sora no Ookoku to Futari no Ko
metas.description: Genres: Comedy Tags:Kids Fourth Sumikko Gurashi movie.
